name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: "Whatever the vice-president is claiming the administration has done, clearly it hasn't worked"

Kamala Harris attacks the administration's coronavirus plan

Mike Pence says that is a "great disservice to the sacrifices" American people made

https://t.co/VZTi41JXWn #VPDebate https://t.co/uFK8NhMiNM

name: BBCWorld
text:
Follow live as the #VPDebate between Kamala Harris and Mike Pence continues:

https://t.co/rsMXdcEul8 https://t.co/V0bfkahoHM

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: Kamala Harris says Trump has "betrayed our friends and embraced dictators around the world"

Mike Pence says "we've stood strong with our allies" but we've been demanding ‚Äì and says Trump unleashed the US military on IS

https://t.co/VZTi41JXWn #VPDebate https://t.co/bw66HWTJTT

name: BBCWorld
text:

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: "I will always fight for a woman's right to make a decision about her own body, it should be her decision," says Kamala Harris, on issue of abortion & Trump's pick for Supreme Court

Mike Pence says, "I'm pro-life and I don't apologise for it"

https://t.co/VZTi41JXWn #VPDebate https://t.co/t0QFJtiUGJ

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: "Bad cops are bad for good cops"

Kamala Harris says there needs to be policing & criminal justice reform

Mike Pence says there's "no excuse" for what happened to George Floyd but also "no excuse for the rioting and the looting that followed" 

https://t.co/VZTi41JXWn #VPDebate https://t.co/HjnXOAnHvv

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: Senator Kamala Harris said President Trump called the coronavirus a ‚Äúhoax‚Äù

Trump didn‚Äôt directly call the virus a hoax, but in February, called the impeachment process against him a ‚Äúhoax‚Äù as well as criticism of his handling of the coronavirus #VPDebate https://t.co/Rr3nj3P5hY https://t.co/RDHSvhyYn8

name: BBCWorld
text:

https://t.co/Hvj4Uc4hEw https://t.co/GIfjV948yN

name: BBCWorld
text:
RT @BBCNorthAmerica: Mike Pence said: ‚ÄúWe destroyed the ISIS caliphate"

The Islamic State group's territory across parts of Iraq and Syria did end under Trump

But as we‚Äôve reported, IS remains a well-disciplined force ‚Äúwhose enduring defeat is not assured" #VPDebate 

https://t.co/xIdNRMsn5j

name: BBCWorld
text: Vice-presidential debates seldom shake up presidential races, but an unmemorable result is good news for the Democrats, writes BBC's Anthony Zurcher #VPDebate https://t.co/DqUrwmXlZR

name: BBCWorld
text:
